name: grant
description: OAuth Middleware for Express, Koa and Hapi
author: Simeon Velichkov <simeonvelichkov@gmail.com> (http://simov.github.io)

scripts.test: npm run lint-lib && npm run lint-test && v=$(node --version | cut -b 4-5) && if [ $v -ge 12 ]; then node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --harmony --recursive test/; else node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/ test/flow/ test/consumer/express/ test/consumer/hapi/; fi
scripts.lint-lib: node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint lib/ && echo Lint lib passed
scripts.lint-test: node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint --config test/.eslintrc test/ && echo Lint test passed
